short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Premier provider of velvet loafers and other men's shoes. Our bespoke tool lets you customize your shoes to fit your taste.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Smythe and Digby is a premier supplier of top quality footwear for men. Our evolving range of shoe styles are made from premium materials.

Subscribe for free to our newsletter and stay up to date on the latest styles and discounts. 

Shop our online catalog. Check out our 3D customizer. 

Smythe and Digby is a  premier provider of fine footwear. Our shoes are made with grade A materials. Our brand is exclusively online, so we have eliminated high costs associated with brick and mortar establishments, and are able to provide the best prices for well crafted products. The designers at Smythe and Digby conjure  up meticulously created styles for our discerning customers without sacrificing quality.  Our remarkable line of products are our gifts to you. Enjoy!
